title: Matrix Transpose in Python
description: In linear algebra, the transpose of a matrix is an operator which flips a matrix over its diagonal. The transpose of a matrix is obtained by exchanging its rows into columns. In Python, we can transpose a two-dimensional list using a simple one-liner code.

meta.title: Linear Algebra Transpose Matrix | Python Programming
meta.description: Learn how to transpose a matrix in Python using a simple one-liner code. Discover the step-by-step process and practical examples.
meta.keywords: linear algebra, matrix transpose, python programming, coding tutorial, matrix operations
